channel.title: How Do I add Specials To a Weapon? Delta Base
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I've been having trouble adding specials, The spec bar appears on the weapon but nothing happens can you please Help me it would be greatly appreicated.
Thanks, Rockin it P.s I have Delta Base

item.title: How Do I add Specials To a Weapon? Delta Base
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

Ok go into your client.java on your source. Search for this&& specialAmount > Now you should find something close to this…[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ##### && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(305);
specialAmount -= 50;
frame174(385, 000, 020);

hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 50);
getHit(45);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(729);
}[/code]
Then after the } you will want to add the same thing as above, but change the maxhit if you want, the specgfx, the animation, the special amount required if you want (currently set to 50), and change the ##### to your weapon id. Now search for thisif(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ##### && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(false, 50, -1, 305); npcDamage(30); specGFX(729); } Now you need to change the npcDamage if you want to, the specgfx again, the amount if you would like to, and the weapon id indicated by the #####.
Hope this helps. By the way, [quote=“usman555, post:2, topic:365482”]private boolean Attack() {[/quote]
That didn’t help at all. Post something if you know the answer or something that will help. Not shit like that. sorry to be rude

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I add Specials To a Weapon? Delta Base
